thread.section_title: Enlightium Academy Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Enlightium Academy | enlightiumacademy.com
thread.title: Angela King
thread.title_full: Enlightium Academy reviewed by Angela King

author: Angela King
title: Angela King
text: I love this school. My daughter transferred here in the second part of her senior year of high school. She suffers from anxiety and depression. This school is really a blessing. The work can be challenging for her at times, but the teachers a really amazing. I was very skeptical at first about online schooling but this school is a Godsend. We heard about this school from online ads. Glad we took the chance. She is on track for graduation.
